= Getting Started =

This is a brief description of how to set up the EIB Suite.
The necessary tools for this tutorial are:
  * Linux machine (include g++ compiler)
  * KNX/IP device 
  * Sheevaplug Plug computer (Optional)

= Details =
== Build & Install ==
  # Install subversion on the computer (*sudo apt-get install subversion*)
  # Install ncurses if not already installed (*sudo apt-get install ncurses*)
  # Download the EIB Suite source code (*svn checkout https://eibsuite.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ eibsuite*)
  # change the the root directory of the project and type: (*make menuconfig*)
  # In the opened window, make sure that everything is marked and then exit & save.
  # In terminal type: (*make install*)

When the compilation process is finished, you can find the EIB Suite binaries in the (*<root project>/bin*).
Now, before you can start and run the different componenets, a little more configuration is required:
  # [http://code.google.com/p/eibsuite/wiki/EIBServer Configure the EIBServer module]
  # [http://code.google.com/p/eibsuite/wiki/WEBServer Configure the WEBServer module]
  # Configure the SMSServer module
  # Configure the AMXServer module
  # [http://code.google.com/p/eibsuite/wiki/EIBRelay Configure the EIBRelay module]
